title: pc issues but only with league.
body:
So oddly enough, whenever i launch league client, service host local system (network) 
my anti virus 

massively increase in resources used and the client runs slow af.

close league, get on wow, no problems at all. 

thoughts?

replies.body: Does this continue to happen if you temporarily disable your Antivirus before you launch League? I suspect this may caused a change!
